resources.string: Staying with us at the Highland Heritage is akin to having your best friend take care of you; pampering you, if you will, for the ultimate ‘home away from home’ experience. Unlike the telephone based impersonal request system of a starred hotel, at the Highland Heritage we encourage our guests to help themselves, while always being right behind to assist you in making your holiday experience a memorable one. Our in-house Villa manager Chahnaz Gayraud is always next door for any assistance you may require
The meticulously tended landscaped gardens in the front, and the 10,000 square meter natural forest behind the Villas, Amor and Sonha are open to guests looking for a spot of solitude and seclusion.

Each of the two villas is equipped with an infinity pool overlooking the serene greenery of the forest. Bask on a lawn chair by the waters while sipping a cocktail, or take a relaxing swim to clear your mind.
Our well-appointed meeting room comfortably seats twelve people, and can be fitted with audio-visual equipment on request.
We have a well equipped library cum study for that rare moment if work catches up with you. One can also choose from our wide selection of books, publications, newspapers, and magazines.
If you’re looking to plan a tour, experience the sights and sounds, hire a car, or just explore, we will help you find exactly what you’re looking for.
